PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ocorrências no ítem
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PD_STATUS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.HANDLETABELAORIGEM IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS B WHERE B.NOME = 'LC_REQUISICAOITENS') AND A.HANDLEREGISTROORIGEM = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICAOITENS) AND DATAINCLUSAO >= (SELECT DATA FROM LC_REQUISICOES WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICOES) ))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1951_at2568_hs9aa076cb.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOESPAI.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT REQUISICAOPAI FROM CP_REQUISICOES WHERE REQUISICAOAQUISICAO = @RASTRO(LC_REQUISICAOITENS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2311_at8084_hs67ee3334.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
